name: Rite of Passage (theDreamland)
description:
Introduction:

As a player you take the shoes of someone lost, a person stuck in their dreams. Your goal is to explore this realm in order to find your way out, or figure out what it is that's keeping you stuck.

Rite of Passage lets you embark on an adventure in a world not too different from ours. Where your achievements will strengthen your journey for control. Master the way you move to reach the darkest depths and brightest highs and maybe somewhere you will find, what the world tries to hide.

Basic Controls:

Touch Joystick - The left side of the screen allows you to move left and right using the speed of the character. 

Jump - Tap the right side of the screen to perform a jump, the length of your jump will be determined by the momentum you have when leaving the ground. 

Slide - Swipe down on the right side of the screen to perform a slide. Sliding increases your speed and is only available when running. Use this to go under obstacles or reach further lengths with your jump. 

The Team:

Rite of Passage is developed as part of a Game Design course at Campus Gotland, Uppsala University in Sweden. It is a Vertical Slice acting as the foundation for a possible larger scale game. Rite of Passage explores an idea and is developed as an educational portfolio piece for the team.

Members:

  • Audrius Labanauskas
  • Devon Jokic
  • Fernando Garcia
  • Ludwig Josefsson
  • Max Hemberg
  • Milana Kononkova

Music By:

  • Elias Faltin
